sentences.sContent: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal hereditary disease.
sentences.sCn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

synos.tran: [遗]遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的

remMethod.val: her (继承人) + edit + ary (…的) → 继承下来的 → 遗传的

words.tran: 世袭财产，可继承的财产

trans.tranOther: a quality or illness that is hereditary is passed from a parent to a child before the child is born
